sentences.sContent: a tortuous path over the mountains to Kandahar
sentences.sCn: 翻山越岭通往坎大哈的一条蜿蜒小径

remMethod.val: tort (弯曲) + uous → 弯曲的 → 曲折的

words.tran: 弯曲地；欺骗地；居心叵测地；转弯抹角地

trans.tranCn: 曲折的； 转弯抹角的
trans.tranOther: a tortuous path, stream, road etc has a lot of bends in it and is therefore difficult to travel along
